en.introText: Rome's greatest orator, statesman, philosopher, and defender of the Republic. Shaped Latin prose and Western rhetoric.

la.introText: Orator Romanus maximus, vir publicus, philosophus et defensor rei publicae. Prosam Latinam et rhetoricam occidentalem formavit.
